## L·ª¢I √çCH V√Ä L√ù DO TU√ÇN TH·ª¶ ATTT <!-- text, from page 0 (l=0.036,t=0.018,r=0.379,b=0.079), with ID 2a640cab-a157-4598-97e1-722c6ded5268 -->

Summary : This image displays the logo for Icetea Software, featuring a stylized red geometric emblem above the company name.

logo: Icetea Software

Logo Elements :
  ‚Ä¢ Central geometric emblem composed of interlocking red lines forming a symmetrical, abstract shape resembling the letters "I" and "S".
  ‚Ä¢ Two small red diamond shapes flanking the central emblem horizontally.
  ‚Ä¢ Company name "Icetea Software" written below the emblem; "Icetea" in light gray, "Software" in bold black.

Typography & Colour :
  ‚Ä¢ "Icetea" uses a thin, sans-serif font in light gray.
  ‚Ä¢ "Software" uses a bold, sans-serif font in black.
  ‚Ä¢ Emblem and diamonds are rendered in solid red (#D32F2F).

Layout & Dimensions :
  ‚Ä¢ Emblem and diamonds are centered above the company name.
  ‚Ä¢ Text is horizontally aligned, with "Icetea" and "Software" on the same line.
  ‚Ä¢ Ample white space surrounds the logo elements.

Analysis :
  ‚Ä¢ The logo combines modern geometric design with clear, contrasting typography to convey a professional and technology-focused brand identity.
  ‚Ä¢ The use of red suggests energy and innovation, while the bold "Software" emphasizes the company's core business. <!-- figure, from page 0 (l=0.893,t=0.000,r=0.969,b=0.093), with ID f6a379fe-bb49-47ca-81e3-730520f7c572 -->
